Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern

Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format

@NonNullByDefault package io.jstach.rainbowgum.pattern.format
Provides Logback style pattern formatters. The URI scheme of pattern encoders is "pattern".

The supported builtin keywords are in the follow enum types:

  • PatternRegistry.KeywordKey
  • PatternRegistry.ColorKey
Rainbow Gum does not currently support all of the builtin keywords that Logback does! But most of them are available.

  • Class
    Description
    PatternCompiler
    Compiles a pattern into a formatter.
    PatternCompiler.Builder
    Builder for PatternCompiler.
    PatternConfig
    Pattern Config needed for pattern keywords that is generally platform specific.
    PatternConfigBuilder
    Builder to create PatternConfig.
    PatternConfigurator
    Configures Logback style pattern encoders and offers provision with the URI scheme "pattern".
    PatternEncoder
    Factory for pattern encoders.
    PatternEncoderBuilder
    Builder to create LogConfig.Provider<LogEncoder>.
    PatternFormatterFactory
    Creates formatters from pattern keywords and are registered to a PatternRegistry.
    PatternFormatterFactory.CompositeFactory
    A composite formatter factory expects possible children.
    PatternFormatterFactory.KeywordFactory
    A keyword formatter factory expects keywords and option list.
    PatternRegistry
    Pattern registry to register custom keywords.
    PatternRegistry.ColorKey
    Built-in supported color pattern keys.
    PatternRegistry.KeywordKey
    Built-in supported pattern keys.
    PatternRegistry.PatternKey
    Pattern keywords.
